translation.en: Well, when you're upset, you bottle up. You can seem angry, like--
translation.zh:
当你心烦意乱 你克制自己
看起来就很生气 就像…

translation.en: Please don't say, "Like Dad."
translation.zh: 别说 “就像老爸”

translation.en: Or else you swing into your momma's-boy charm offensive...
translation.zh:
或者你可以变得讨好他人
那样太肤浅了

translation.en: and that can feel glib. Perfect.
translation.zh:
或者你可以变得讨好他人
那样太肤浅了 谢谢

translation.en: I'll balance on the exact fucking edge of your emotional razor.
translation.zh: 这两种情绪很难平衡

translation.en: Okay. Just be...
translation.zh:
-好吧 只要…
-做自己？

translation.en: Myself?
translation.zh:
-好吧 只要…
-做自己？ …通过抽奖赞助西郡的4H组织

translation.en: MAN: (ON RADIO) ...sponsoring a raffle to benefit West County 4H...
translation.zh: …通过抽奖赞助西郡的4H组织

translation.en: and raffling season tickets for Mizzou football.
translation.zh: 奖项为密苏里大学橄榄球队的季票

translation.en: Buy your tickets at the Wing Hut or local Tri-State Tire stores.
translation.zh:
请到翅胜客
或当地的三态汽修店购票

translation.en: Your in-laws made it.
translation.zh: 你的岳父母赶来了

translation.en: Hi, Rand. Hey, man.
translation.zh:
-嗨 兰德
-嗨

translation.en: I'm Detective Boney.
translation.zh: 我是博尼警探

translation.en: I'm the twin. Margo.
translation.zh: 我是他的双胞胎妹妹 玛戈

translation.en: We played tennis yesterday, Nick. I just can't get over it.
translation.zh:
我们昨天打网球了 尼克
我一下还缓不过神来

translation.en: Marybeth, I am really sorry.
translation.zh: 玛丽贝丝 非常抱歉

translation.en: I knew you never should have moved back here.
translation.zh:
我早就说
不让你们搬到这里

translation.en: We didn't have a lot of choice.
translation.zh: 我们当时没的选择

translation.en: We are all worried. We are all scared.
translation.zh: 我们都很担心 都很害怕

translation.en: But we are all here now. And we will find Amy, together.
translation.zh:
但我们都在这里
我们团结起来会找到艾米的

translation.en: Should I just go first, and then you guys can say something?
translation.zh:
要不要我先说两句
然后你们再发言？

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: As you know, my wife, Amy Elliott Dunne...
translation.zh:
如你们所知 我的妻子
艾米埃利奥特邓恩…

translation.en: disappeared from our home on the morning of July 5th...
translation.zh:
于7月5日早上
从家中失踪

translation.en: under suspicious circumstances.
translation.zh: 情况十分可疑

translation.en: MALE REPORTER: Louder!
translation.zh: 大声点！

translation.en: If anyone out there, uh, has any information...
translation.zh: 如果大家有任何线索…

translation.en: please come forward.
translation.zh: 敬请相告

translation.en: Thank you. (CAMERA SHUTTER CLICKING)
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I'm Rand Elliott. My wife, Marybeth Elliott.
translation.zh:
我是兰德埃利奥特
这是我的妻子玛丽贝丝埃利奥特

translation.en: Should I have said my name?
translation.zh:
我是兰德埃利奥特
这是我的妻子玛丽贝丝埃利奥特 我是不是也该自报姓名？

translation.en: RAND: Amy is our only child.
translation.zh: 我是不是也该自报姓名？ 艾米是我们唯一的孩子

translation.en: She's bright, she's beautiful. She's kind.
translation.zh: 她聪明、美丽、善良

translation.en: She really is Amazing Amy.
translation.zh: 她就是 “神奇艾米”

translation.en: You know, there are millions of people out there...
translation.zh:
有无数的人
是读着她的故事长大的

translation.en: who grew up with her and care about her.
translation.zh:
有无数的人
是读着她的故事长大的 而且都很关心她

translation.en: We care about her, we love her.
translation.zh: 而且都很关心她 我们关心她、爱她

translation.en: And we just want her back.
translation.zh: 只想她回到我们身边

translation.en: Amy is a decorated scholar.
translation.zh: 艾米是荣誉满身的学者

translation.en: She forged a successful career in journalism.
translation.zh: 她在新闻方面颇有建树

translation.en: She returned here to her husband's hometown...
translation.zh: 她跟随夫君回到他的家乡

translation.en: and she made a life in her adopted home.
translation.zh: 并在夫君家中深得长辈喜爱

translation.en: Now, Amy needs your help.
translation.zh: 现在 艾米需要你的帮助

translation.en: We're establishing a volunteer headquarters at the Drury Lodge.
translation.zh:
我们将在德鲁里酒店
设立志愿者总部

translation.en: We have a hotline, 1-855-4-AMY-TIPS.
translation.zh:
我们的热线号码是
1-855-4-AMY-TIPS

translation.en: And our website is www.FindAmazingAmy.com.
translation.zh:
网址是
www.FindAmazingAmy.com

translation.en: FEMALE REPORTER: Mr. Dunne! MALE REPORTER: Mr. Elliott!
translation.zh:
-邓恩先生！
-埃利奥特先生！

translation.en: (OVERLAPPING SHOUTING)
translation.zh:
-邓恩先生！
-埃利奥特先生！ 邓恩先生 有没有暴力迹象？

translation.en: FEMALE REPORTER: Mr. Dunne, any signs of foul play? (REPORTERS CLAMORING)
translation.zh: 邓恩先生 有没有暴力迹象？

translation.en: Mr. Elliott, when was the last time you spoke to your daughter?
translation.zh:
埃利奥特先生 你们最后一次
和女儿通话是什么时候？

translation.en: MALE REPORTER: Smile.
translation.zh: 微笑

translation.en: That's all for now. Thank you.
translation.zh: 发布会到此为止 谢谢

translation.en: RAND: Amy is the kind of girl who attracts admirers.
translation.zh: 艾米有众多仰慕者

translation.en: Right, Nick? Yeah, definitely.
translation.zh:
-对吗 尼克？
-是的 当然

translation.en: And we've had instances...
translation.zh:
我们曾有过… -可怕的…
-先例

translation.en: where things got-- Scary.
translation.zh:
-可怕的…
-先例

translation.en: Do you know about Desi Collings?
translation.zh: 你知道德西柯林斯吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I know all about Desi Collings.
translation.zh: 我清楚他的事

translation.en: MARYBETH: He was obsessed.
translation.zh: 他曾痴迷于艾米

translation.en: He attempted suicide after Amy broke up with him sophomore year.
translation.zh:
高二艾米和他分手后
他曾试图自杀

translation.en: We had to file a restraining order.
translation.zh: 我们不得不申请限制令

translation.en: This would be high school? Twenty years ago?
translation.zh:
这事发生在高中？
二十年前？

translation.en: But he recently moved to St. Louis. That's just two hours away.
translation.zh:
但他最近搬到了圣路易斯
距此地只有两个小时车程

translation.en: To be fair, he is from St. Louis.
translation.zh: 人家本来就住在圣路易斯

translation.en: RAND: We also have Tommy O'Hara.
translation.zh: 还有汤米奥哈拉

translation.en: This is only eight years ago, in New York.
translation.zh: 这事发生在八年前 在纽约

translation.en: She broke up with him, he got very physical.
translation.zh:
艾米和他分手
他还不停骚扰她

translation.en: She filed charges. BONEY: What was the charge?
translation.zh:
-艾米起诉了他
-以什么名义？

translation.en: Sexual assault, threat, battery, what?
translation.zh: 性骚扰 威胁 殴打？

translation.en: I only know it was bad.
translation.zh: 我只知道那事情很恶劣

translation.en: I didn't know this. BONEY: Okay.
translation.zh:
-我不知道此事
-好的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Uh, anything more recent?
translation.zh: 还有更新的情况吗？

translation.en: Not that I know of.
translation.zh: 我不知道了

translation.en: Hey, Nick? You got a minute?
translation.zh: 嘿 尼克？能借一步说话吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Imagine our confusion.
translation.zh: 想象一下我们有多困惑

translation.en: A missing persons case...
translation.zh: 人口失踪案

translation.en: and in your wife's dressing room... we find an envelope marked "clue."
translation.zh:
但在你妻子的化妆间
我们发现一个标着 “线索”的信封

translation.en: That's for our anniversary.
translation.zh: 那是结婚周年用的

translation.en: My wife does these treasure hunts.
translation.zh: 我妻子喜欢玩寻宝游戏

translation.en: I'm hoping you can tell me what this means.
translation.zh:
希望你能告诉我
这是什么意思

translation.en: You want to solve Amy's treasure hunt?
translation.zh: 想解开艾米的寻宝游戏之谜？

translation.en: It'll help me track Amy's movements before she disappeared.
translation.zh:
这会帮助我追踪
艾米消失之前的活动

translation.en: Of course. Okay.
translation.zh: 当然 好的

translation.en: "Although this spot couldn't be tighter...
translation.zh: “尽管这个地点很狭小…

translation.en: "it's a cozy room for my favorite writer."
translation.zh:
“我最爱的作家
在那里却会感到舒适”

translation.en: I know this one!
translation.zh: 我知道答案！

translation.en: AMY: Although this spot couldn't be any tighter...
translation.zh: 尽管这个地点很狭小

translation.en: it's a cozy room for my favorite writer.
translation.zh:
我最爱的作家
在那里却会感到舒适

translation.en: After-school meeting, don't mind if I do.
translation.zh: 别介意我让你放学后别走

translation.en: Maybe I'll teach you a thing or two.
translation.zh: 或许我会教你两手

translation.en: Well, well. What does it say?
translation.zh: 喔 上面怎么说？

translation.en: Clue two.
translation.zh: 线索二

translation.en: "Hey, handsome man, let's go undercover.
translation.zh: “嘿 帅哥 我们来搞地下情

translation.en: "You'll be the spy, and I'll be his lover.
translation.zh:
“你做间谍
我做他的情人

translation.en: "Let's head on over...
translation.zh: （课本要点） “让我们前往那间棕色的小屋…”

translation.en: "to the little brown house.
translation.zh: “让我们前往那间棕色的小屋…”

translation.en: "We'll play hot, doting husband, sweet, loving spouse."
translation.zh: “我们来扮演一对淫娃荡妇”

translation.en: These yours?
translation.zh: 这是你的？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: But you read the first clue.
translation.zh: 不过 听完线索一 你懂的

translation.en: Randy professor, naughty student.
translation.zh: 好色教授 调皮学生

translation.en: I blush.
translation.zh: 我自愧不如

translation.en: Me and my ex just swapped cards.
translation.zh: 我和前夫只是交换贺卡而已

translation.en: Where's this little brown house?
translation.zh: 棕色的小屋在哪里？

translation.en: I have no idea.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: Nicholas Dunne. (ALARM BLARING INCREASES)
translation.zh: 我是尼古拉斯邓恩

translation.en: (SPEAKING LOUDER) Under my father's name, William Dunne.
translation.zh: 在我父亲名下 威廉姆邓恩

translation.en: My wife's first pet? Is this necessary? Can you just turn the bell-- Yeah, I know.
translation.zh:
我妻子的第一个宠物？有必要吗？
你就不能把警铃关了…

translation.en: It's, uh... It's, uh...
translation.zh:
好的 我知道
它叫…它叫…

translation.en: It's "Puddles," right? Or is it "Poodles?"
translation.zh:
“帕多斯” 对吗？
或者是 “普多斯”？

translation.en: We're good.
translation.zh: 我们没事

translation.en: (ALARM CEASES) Hello, stranger.
translation.zh: 你好 陌生人

translation.en: Fancy meeting you here.
translation.zh: 很高兴在这里见到你

translation.en: It's your dad's house, right?
translation.zh: 这是你父亲的房子 对吧？

translation.en: Are you following me? What you doing?
translation.zh: 你在跟踪我？ 你来这里做什么？

translation.en: Like you said, it's my dad's house.
translation.zh: 如你所说 这是我父亲的房子

translation.en: I come by once a week, make sure the place hasn't burned down.
translation.zh:
我每周来一次
检查房子的情况

translation.en: But it looks okay.
translation.zh: 看起来没事

translation.en: I'll walk you out.
translation.zh: 我送你出去

translation.en: You know...
translation.zh: 你知道…

translation.en: I thought maybe this was the little brown house.
translation.zh:
我觉得这个可能就是
那个棕色的小屋

translation.en: From the clue.
translation.zh: 线索上说的那个

translation.en: Nope. Still blue.
translation.zh: 不 它是蓝色的

translation.en: AMY: Picture me, I'm a girl who's very, very bad.
translation.zh:
想象一下我
我是个很坏很坏的女孩

translation.en: I need to be punished, and by "punished," I mean "had."
translation.zh:
我需要被惩罚
被 “惩罚”的意思是被 “干”

translation.en: It's where you keep goodies for anniversary five.
translation.zh:
那里就是
放置结婚五周年纪念品的地方

translation.en: "So open the door, and look alive."
translation.zh: “请打开门 仔细看”

translation.en: Bitch! (HORN HONKS)
translation.zh: 婊子！

translation.en: AMY: Want to test your marriage for weak spots?
translation.zh: 想要检测你婚姻的薄弱点？

translation.en: Add one recession...
translation.zh: 经历一次经济困境

translation.en: subtract two jobs.
translation.zh: 两人都失去工作

translation.en: It's surprisingly effective.
translation.zh: 你就看到检测效果了

translation.en: Promise me we'll never be like them.
translation.zh: 你保证我们永远不会像他们一样

translation.en: Like who?
translation.zh: 像谁？

translation.en: All those awful couples we know.
translation.zh: 我们认识的那些夫妻

translation.en: Those wives who treat their men like dancing monkeys...
translation.zh:
那些妻子把丈夫
当作跳舞的猴子一样

translation.en: to be trained and paraded.
translation.zh: 进行训练 用来炫耀

translation.en: Husbands who treat their wives like the highway patrol...
translation.zh:
那些丈夫把妻子
当作高速巡警

translation.en: to be out-foxed and avoided.
translation.zh: 与之斗智斗勇 避之不及

translation.en: I think I'm gonna be laid off.
translation.zh: 我可能要失业了

translation.en: We're in a recession. If it happens, we'll deal with it.
translation.zh:
我们遇到经济困境
如果真是这样 我们一起应对

translation.en: I'll probably be next.
translation.zh: 下一个失业的可能就是我

translation.en: We have each other.
translation.zh: 只要我们拥有彼此

translation.en: Everything else is background noise.
translation.zh: 一切问题都不成问题

translation.en: You are exceptional.
translation.zh: 你是个独特的女人

translation.en: My turn.
translation.zh: 该我说了

translation.en: My parents' publisher dropped them... and they're in debt up to their ears.
translation.zh:
我父母被出版商抛弃了
他们欠下一屁股债

translation.en: That's terrible.
translation.zh: 真不幸

translation.en: And they need to borrow from my trust fund.
translation.zh: 他们需要借用我的信托基金

translation.en: How much?
translation.zh: 借多少？

translation.en: Almost a million.
translation.zh: 差不多一百万

translation.en: That's almost all of it.
translation.zh: 那几乎是全部

translation.en: This is where you say, "Everything else is background noise."
translation.zh:
你这时应该说
 “一切问题都不成问题”

translation.en: Amy, if you're laid off... and I'm laid off...
translation.zh:
艾米 如果你失业了
我也失业了…

translation.en: I said I'd do it.
translation.zh: 我承诺借给他们了

translation.en: Without talking to me?
translation.zh: 都不跟我商量？

translation.en: Well, it's... Your call.
translation.zh:
-那些是…
-随你便

translation.en: ...their money, technically.
translation.zh: …他们的钱 严格来说

translation.en: You know what? You're right.
translation.zh: 知道吗？你是对的

translation.en: Everything else is just background noise.
translation.zh: 一切问题都不成问题

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: More games?
translation.zh: 又买了新游戏？

translation.en: Yeah, I just wanted to shoot some folks.
translation.zh: 是啊 我就想开枪射人

translation.en: What's the laptop for?
translation.zh: 买笔记本电脑干什么？

translation.en: Laptop-ing.
translation.zh: 记笔记

translation.en: Oh, I see.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: You can give your parents $879,000 without talking to me...
translation.zh:
你不跟我商量
就给你父母87万9千美元

translation.en: but God forbid I buy a video game...
translation.zh:
你不跟我商量
就给你父母87万9千美元 却不允许我买一个新游戏

translation.en: without getting your permission.
translation.zh: 却不允许我买一个新游戏

translation.en: You are spending a lot.
translation.zh: 却不允许我买一个新游戏 你花的钱够多了

translation.en: You don't trust me. You don't trust my judgment.
translation.zh:
你不信任我
不信任我的判断

translation.en: You certainly don't trust my intention.
translation.zh: 当然也不信任我的意图

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你说什么呢？

translation.en: That's the basic tenet of a prenup, isn't it?
translation.zh:
信任是我们婚前协议的基本原则
对吗？

translation.en: Why are you throwing that in my face again?
translation.zh: 你为什么又和我吵架？

translation.en: Because it's easy to throw. Nick, I don't get it.
translation.zh:
因为太容易吵起来了 尼克 我不明白你为什么要
逼我变成我不喜欢的那种人

translation.en: I don't get why you're daring me... to be someone I don't wanna be.
translation.zh:
尼克 我不明白你为什么要
逼我变成我不喜欢的那种人

translation.en: The nagging shrew. The controlling bitch.
translation.zh:
那种挑剔的泼妇
那种爱管老公的婊子

translation.en: I'm not that person. I'm your wife. (GROANS)
translation.zh: 我不是那种人 我是你妻子

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I just don't know how to do this. I've never not had a job.
translation.zh:
我只是不知道如何应对失业
我没有失业过

translation.en: I flipped burgers, I painted houses.
translation.zh:
我在快餐店干过
也干过油漆工

translation.en: You'll get another job.
translation.zh:
我在快餐店干过
也干过油漆工 你会再就业的

translation.en: Hi, Go.
translation.zh: 嗨 玛戈

translation.en: What? Hold on. What? (INDISTINCT TALKING OVER PHONE)
translation.zh: 什么？等等 什么？

translation.en: AMY: And suddenly... Slow down, what is it?
translation.zh:
-突然间…
-慢点讲 怎么回事？

translation.en: AMY: ...I knew everything was about to get worse.
translation.zh: …我知道一切都会变得更糟

translation.en: Okay, tell me what's wrong.
translation.zh: 好的 告诉我怎么回事

translation.en: Bless you, Nick. Father.
translation.zh:
-上帝保佑 尼克
-神父

translation.en: Hey, Tom. Mayor!
translation.zh: 嘿 汤姆 镇长！

translation.en: Nick, good to see you.
translation.zh: 尼克 很高兴见到你

translation.en: NICK: Good to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Hey, guys, hey.
translation.zh: 嘿 伙计们 嘿

translation.en: Jodie. Nick.
translation.zh:
-乔迪
-尼克

translation.en: Oh, we'll find her. Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我们会找到她的

translation.en: You look like hammered shit.
translation.zh: 你看起来糟透了

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You ever see that guy in the glasses before?
translation.zh: 你见过戴眼镜那个男人吗？

translation.en: Don't worry. We videotape everybody that comes in and out of these things.
translation.zh:
别担心 进出的每个人
都会被拍下来的

translation.en: I mean, you tend to get a lot of...
translation.zh: 这里似乎有很多…

translation.en: Do-gooders? Freaks.
translation.zh:
-热心人？
-变态

translation.en: Hey, I meant to ask you.
translation.zh: 嘿 我想问问你

translation.en: Noelle Hawthorne? (WOMAN TALKING INDISTINCTLY OVER PA)
translation.zh: 诺埃尔霍桑？

translation.en: She lives on your street. Amy's best friend.
translation.zh:
她和你们住一条街
艾米最好的朋友

translation.en: I've never heard the name Noelle Hawthorne.
translation.zh: 我从没听过诺埃尔霍桑这个名字

translation.en: She and her husband have triplets.
translation.zh: 她和丈夫有个三胞胎

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: Yeah, we might say hi to them on the street.
translation.zh: 对了 我们可能在街上打过招呼

translation.en: But "best friend"? No.
translation.zh: 但是 “挚友”？谈不上

translation.en: (MAN TALKING INDISTINCTLY OVER PA) Excuse me, one sec.
translation.zh: 失陪一下

translation.en: He acted like Noelle was a complete stranger.
translation.zh:
他装得好像
诺埃尔完全是个陌生人似的

translation.en: Of course he did.
translation.zh: 他当然要装

translation.en: Look, these two are yours.
translation.zh: 这两个糕点给你

translation.en: Oh, look. He's being a good guy...
translation.zh: 看呐 他在装好人

translation.en: so everybody can see him being a good guy.
translation.zh: 做给所有人看

translation.en: Oh, you really don't like him, do you?
translation.zh: 你真的不喜欢他 对吧？

translation.en: What's to like?
translation.zh: 有什么好喜欢的？

translation.en: AUTOMATED VOICE: This mailbox is currently full.
translation.zh: 此信箱已满 请按1…

translation.en: Press one to--
translation.zh:
此信箱已满 请按1… 尼克？我想做一下自我介绍
我叫肖恩凯莉

translation.en: Nick? I just wanted to introduce myself. My name's Shawna Kelly.
translation.zh:
尼克？我想做一下自我介绍
我叫肖恩凯莉

translation.en: I am so sorry for your troubles.
translation.zh: 对你的遭遇我深感抱歉

translation.en: Thank you. That's kind. Are you remembering to eat?
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-你还记得吃东西吗？

translation.en: Well, a lot of cold cuts.
translation.zh: 粗茶淡饭

translation.en: I'm gonna fix you up my world-famous chicken Frito pie.
translation.zh:
我会用我世界知名的
油炸鸡肉玉米饼来给你补补身子

translation.en: That's very kind and very unnecessary.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 但不必了

translation.en: You have to keep your strength.
translation.zh: 你必须保重身体

translation.en: Would you...
translation.zh: 你能…

translation.en: say, "Chicken Frito pie!" (PHONE CLICKS)
translation.zh: 说： “鸡肉玉米饼！”

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: Would you delete that picture for me?
translation.zh: 你能把照片删了吗？

translation.en: It's a nice photo. I know it is.
translation.zh:
-拍得不错啊
-我知道

translation.en: But just do me a favor.
translation.zh: 但帮我个忙

translation.en: Will you?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: Would you go ahead and please delete that picture?
translation.zh: 你能把照片删了吗？

translation.en: You just press... (GASPS)
translation.zh: 只要按一下…

translation.en: What is wrong with you?
translation.zh: 你要干嘛？

translation.en: Could you please not share that with anyone?
translation.zh: 那能不和其他人分享吗？

translation.en: I will share it with whomever I please.
translation.zh:
我想和谁分享
就和谁分享

translation.en: GO: Dude. Yeah?
translation.zh:
-老哥
-怎么了？

translation.en: Marybeth is pissed.
translation.zh: 玛丽贝丝生气了

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Marybeth?
translation.zh: 玛丽贝丝？

translation.en: It's like you're the goddamn Homecoming King.
translation.zh: 你可真会利用机会笼络人心

translation.en: It was important to my mother that I be polite...
translation.zh:
我妈妈一直教导我
要有礼貌

translation.en: I be considerate, I be a gentleman.
translation.zh:
我妈妈一直教导我
要有礼貌 要体贴他人 要做个绅士

translation.en: It looked like you were having fun.
translation.zh: 要体贴他人 要做个绅士 但看起来你很开心

translation.en: (WHISPERING) I am in a nightmare!
translation.zh: 我在经历一场噩梦！

translation.en: All I'm trying to do is be nice...
translation.zh: 我只想友善地对待

translation.en: to the people who are volunteering to help find Amy.
translation.zh: 那些帮助寻找艾米的志愿者

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 你说的对

translation.en: And I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: My God, this place literally smells like feces.
translation.zh: 天呐 这个地方一股大粪的气味

translation.en: In your searches, did you find any golf clubs, real fancy?
translation.zh:
搜寻过程中
有没有找到昂贵的高尔夫球棒？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh:
搜寻过程中
有没有找到昂贵的高尔夫球棒？ 没有

translation.en: How about a brand new Stratocaster?
translation.zh: 有没有全新的名牌贝司？

translation.en: No, nothing like that.
translation.zh: 没有 没发现

translation.en: Well, all right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: How big's that TV? It's not 65-inch.
translation.zh:
那台电视机有多大？
不是65英寸吧

translation.en: No, it's nowhere near that.
translation.zh: 不 没有那么大

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Kibble? Excuse me?
translation.zh:
-猫粮呢？
-什么？

translation.en: He asked me to feed his cat.
translation.zh: 他让我帮他喂猫 好像在食品储存室里

translation.en: Oh, I saw some in the pantry. (DOORBELL RINGING)
translation.zh: 好像在食品储存室里

translation.en: NOELLE: Detective Boney, Officer Gilpin? Noelle Hawthorne!
translation.zh:
博尼警探 吉尔平警官？
我是诺埃尔霍桑！

translation.en: I know y'all are in there!
translation.zh: 我知道你们在里面！

translation.en: Would you please escort Miss Hawthorne... and her children back out to the street?
translation.zh:
你能把霍桑小姐和
她的孩子们送走吗？

translation.en: Detective Boney!
translation.zh: 博尼警探！

translation.en: Just remind her it is a possible crime scene.
translation.zh: 提醒她这里可能是罪案现场

translation.en: Look at that pie-eating grin... from a guy whose wife is missing.
translation.zh:
看那张大笑着的脸
他的妻子已经失踪了啊

translation.en: How are you doing? Terrific.
translation.zh:
-你怎么样？
-好极了

translation.en: How's Marybeth?
translation.zh: 玛丽贝丝呢？

translation.en: She's a wreck.
translation.zh: 情绪低落至极

translation.en: And you?
translation.zh: 你呢？

translation.en: Awesome.
translation.zh: 很爽

translation.en: Hey...
translation.zh: 嘿…

translation.en: have you told me everything?
translation.zh: 你有什么事瞒着我吗？

translation.en: Of course. Everything?
translation.zh:
-当然没有
-毫无隐瞒？

translation.en: Why would you even ask me that?
translation.zh:
为什么这么问？ 自从艾米失踪那天早上
你到“酒吧”那时开始 你就显得…

translation.en: Ever since you walked into The Bar that morning Amy went missing, you seem...
translation.zh:
自从艾米失踪那天早上
你到“酒吧”那时开始 你就显得…

translation.en: off. I am off.
translation.zh:
-魂不守舍
-你说的对

translation.en: Everybody's examining me and projecting their shit on me.
translation.zh:
所有人都在审问我
把一切都归咎于我

translation.en: All I want is to come over here, have a beer with you...
translation.zh:
我只想来你这里
和你喝一杯…

translation.en: and not be judged.
translation.zh: 不是来接受评判的

translation.en: Can we do that?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: Of course. (SIGHS)
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: You know what I keep thinking?
translation.zh: 你知道我一直在想什么吗？

translation.en: -If Mom were here? -Yeah. Like I'm 12.
translation.zh: 如果妈妈还活着？ 对 就像我十二岁时

translation.en: Nick, Mom would fix it.
translation.zh: 尼克 妈妈会搞定一切

translation.en: I'm gonna go Benadryl myself to sleep.
translation.zh: 我要去喝点安眠药

translation.en: Love you. Love you.
translation.zh:
-我爱你
-我也爱你

translation.en: AMY: So, here's a strange, new sentence.
translation.zh: （2010年9月23日） 这是一个陌生的新句子

translation.en: I am a Missourian.
translation.zh: 我是密苏里人

translation.en: Mmm, bye, Dad.
translation.zh: 再见 爸爸

translation.en: AMY: No money, no jobs, no prospects.
translation.zh: 没有钱 没有工作 没有希望

translation.en: And then, we heard from Go.
translation.zh: 然后 玛戈告诉我们

translation.en: Mama Maureen...
translation.zh: 我的岳母莫琳…

translation.en: Stage 4 breast cancer.
translation.zh: 已是乳癌晚期

translation.en: So, we moved to Missouri.
translation.zh: 于是 我们搬到密苏里

translation.en: I don't mind.
translation.zh: 我不介意

translation.en: I just wish he'd asked.
translation.zh:
我只希望他事先
能征求一下我的意见

translation.en: (GO LAUGHING)
translation.zh: （出租）

translation.en: Nick is happy to be home.
translation.zh: 尼克很高兴回到家

translation.en: But I don't know if he's happy I'm with him.
translation.zh:
但我不知道
他是否高兴我随他而来

translation.en: I feel like something he loaded by mistake.
translation.zh:
我感觉自己
是被尼克不小心带来的

translation.en: Something to be jettisoned, if necessary.
translation.zh:
如果有需要
他会抛弃我

translation.en: Something disposable.
translation.zh: 我是可抛弃的

translation.en: I feel like I could disappear.
translation.zh: 我感觉自己会消失

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天！

translation.en: I saw you on TV. Okay. (SHUSHING)
translation.zh:
-我在电视上看到你
-好的

translation.en: It's so crazy. Yeah, I know.
translation.zh:
-太可怕了
-我知道

translation.en: She just vanished? She's just gone.
translation.zh:
-她消失了？
-一去无踪

translation.en: I've been so worried about you. Where have you been?
translation.zh:
-我好担心你
-你去哪里了？

translation.en: I called you a hundred times. You gotta pick up your phone!
translation.zh:
-我好担心你
-你去哪里了？ 我给你打了无数次
你都不接电话！

translation.en: Rehearsals. What?
translation.zh:
我给你打了无数次
你都不接电话！ -排练
-什么？

translation.en: Godspell.
translation.zh: 《福音》排练

translation.en: (WHISPERING) My sister's asleep in the other room.
translation.zh: 我妹妹在另一个房间里睡觉

translation.en: I needed to see you.
translation.zh: 我要见你

translation.en: I know this is a bad idea.
translation.zh: 我知道这样不对

translation.en: Can you at least tell me you love me?
translation.zh: 你能告诉我你爱我吗？

translation.en: I do love you, but we have to be really careful right now.
translation.zh:
我爱你
但我们现在必须谨慎

translation.en: Oh, I've been so scared.
translation.zh: 我好害怕

translation.en: Between rehearsals?
translation.zh: 在排练间隙？

translation.en: You told me I needed to have my own life.
translation.zh: 你说过我要有自己的生活

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: We need to stop.
translation.zh: 我们不能这样了

translation.en: I need you.
translation.zh: 我需要你

translation.en: Touch me.
translation.zh: 摸我

translation.en: Stop it. Come here.
translation.zh: 别 过来

translation.en: Sit down.
translation.zh: 坐下

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Did you, by any chance, tell anybody anything about us?
translation.zh:
你有没有不小心
跟别人说过我们的事？

translation.en: Even in texting, or on Facebook.
translation.zh: 包括短信 或者在脸书上

translation.en: Facebook? I use the disposable phone.
translation.zh: 脸书？我用的是临时手机

translation.en: You buy my presents in cash. I'm not stupid, Nick.
translation.zh:
你给我买礼物也是用现金
我不傻 尼克

translation.en: I know, sweetie. Did you leave a pair of red panties in my office?
translation.zh:
我知道亲爱的 你是不是
把红色内裤落在我办公室了？

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe. They better be mine.
translation.zh:
我不知道 可能吧
最好是我的

translation.en: Sweetheart, think.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 想一想

translation.en: I don't know. I'd have to check my red panty inventory.
translation.zh:
我不知道
我要看一下我的衣柜才知道

translation.en: Andie, I need you to take this seriously, okay?
translation.zh: 安迪 你要认真点好吗？

translation.en: This is the last time we're gonna see each other, until...
translation.zh: 最近我们不能再见面了 直到…

translation.en: Until when?
translation.zh: 直到什么时候？

translation.en: Until it's safe.
translation.zh: 直到安全

translation.en: You were going to get a divorce.
translation.zh: 你本来要离婚的

translation.en: Never say that out loud again.
translation.zh: 不要再声张此事

translation.en: Okay. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 好的 抱歉

translation.en: I don't wanna fight.
translation.zh: 我不想吵架

translation.en: I just wanna be with you.
translation.zh: 我只想和你在一起

translation.en: Andie, oh, please...
translation.zh: 安迪 别…

translation.en: That's all I want.
translation.zh: 我别无他求

translation.en: I can't.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: It's our last time together.
translation.zh: 这是我们的最后一次

translation.en: Let's make the most of it.
translation.zh: 我们要尽情

translation.en: NICK: Real quick, but then you have to go.
translation.zh: 要快点 然后你必须走

translation.en: AMY: My husband has come undone.
translation.zh: （2011年10月2日） 我丈夫变得心烦气躁

translation.en: We moved to Missouri to save Maureen...
translation.zh: 我们搬到密苏里来照顾莫琳

translation.en: but as it turns out, we couldn't.
translation.zh: 但最后她还是去世了

translation.en: It means a lot that you came.
translation.zh: 谢谢你能来

translation.en: AMY: We took a hit on the brownstone...
translation.zh: 我们卖了纽约的房子

translation.en: and I used the last of my trust fund to buy him a bar.
translation.zh:
用我信托基金的余款
给他买了一间酒吧

translation.en: So far, it's just costing money.
translation.zh: 目前 酒吧还在亏损

translation.en: Nick uses me for sex when he wants. (PANTING)
translation.zh: 我成了尼克的泄欲工具

translation.en: Otherwise, I don't exist. Whoo!
translation.zh: 除此之外 他对我熟视无睹

translation.en: We should go to Outback tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚我们应该去吃牛排

translation.en: That would be nice.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: AMY: Last night, I went from desperate to pathetic.
translation.zh: 昨晚 我从绝望变成可怜

translation.en: I became someone I don't even like.
translation.zh: 我变成了我讨厌的那种人

translation.en: The kind of woman I used to mock.
translation.zh: 我曾经嘲弄的那种女人

translation.en: You're out so much.
translation.zh: 你出门太多了

translation.en: I know. Stay home.
translation.zh:
-我知道
-别出去了

translation.en: I can't, I'm already late. Then, can I come?
translation.zh:
-不行 我已经晚了
-那我能和你一起吗？

translation.en: You would hate it.
translation.zh: 你不会喜欢的

translation.en: It's a bunch of my dorky high school friends.
translation.zh: 都是一群我高中的傻朋友

translation.en: Do our code. No bullshit.
translation.zh: 做我们的暗号 不骗人

translation.en: I thought we weren't gonna be that couple.
translation.zh: 我以为我们不会成为互相猜疑的夫妻

translation.en: Okay, bye.
translation.zh: 好的 再见

translation.en: Hey, I've been thinking. Yeah?
translation.zh:
-嘿 我一直在想
-什么？

translation.en: Something positive.
translation.zh: 积极的事

translation.en: Maybe it's time.
translation.zh: 可能是时候了

translation.en: Now is literally the worst time.
translation.zh: 现在最不是时候了

translation.en: It would be a new start for us.
translation.zh: 这可能成为我们新的起点

translation.en: And for me, I would have a real purpose here.
translation.zh:
对我而言
那也将成为我在这里的意义

translation.en: A child is not a hobby.
translation.zh: 孩子不是爱好

translation.en: Not a hobby.
translation.zh: 不是爱好

translation.en: An inspiration.
translation.zh: 是鼓励

translation.en: We could have had this fight four hours ago. I'm late.
translation.zh:
我们应该在四个小时前吵这一架
现在我要迟到了

translation.en: I didn't know it was gonna be a fight.
translation.zh: 我没想到会吵架

translation.en: You really wanna be the couple that has a baby... to save their marriage?
translation.zh:
真的需要一个孩子
来保全我们的婚姻吗？

translation.en: "Save"?
translation.zh: “保全”？

translation.en: Reboot, retool, rekindle, whatever!
translation.zh:
重启 革新
重新点燃 随便怎么说！

translation.en: And you're gonna walk out the door now? Yeah!
translation.zh:
-你现在就要出门吗？
-没错！

translation.en: You're a fucking coward.
translation.zh: 你这个懦夫

translation.en: No, it can't go on like this. Oh, really?
translation.zh:
-这样下去可不行
-是吗？

translation.en: I won't. You won't?
translation.zh:
-我不想
-你不想？

translation.en: You won't? Why, it's not good enough for you?
translation.zh:
你不想？
这不就是你想要的吗？

translation.en: It's not even close!
translation.zh: 才不是呢！

translation.en: You stupid bitch!
translation.zh: 才不是呢！ 你这个愚蠢的婊子！

translation.en: AMY: What scared me wasn't that he'd pushed me.
translation.zh:
让我害怕的
不是他推倒了我

translation.en: What scared me was how much he wanted to hurt me more.
translation.zh:
让我害怕的是
他有多么想要伤害我

translation.en: What scared me was that I'd finally realized...
translation.zh:
让我害怕的是
我终于意识到…

translation.en: I am frightened of my own husband.
translation.zh: 我害怕自己的丈夫

translation.en: You want me to call for backup?
translation.zh: 需要呼叫支援吗？

translation.en: Nah, I'll protect you.
translation.zh: 不用 我会保护你的

translation.en: GILPIN: Jesus.
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: They ought to burn this place down.
translation.zh: 这个地方应该烧掉

translation.en: BONEY: Seems like folks are trying.
translation.zh: 似乎人们都想这样

translation.en: You really think this is anything?
translation.zh: 你觉得这有用吗？

translation.en: Cross it off the list.
translation.zh: 查过之后才能知道

translation.en: Hey, Jason.
translation.zh: 嘿 詹森

translation.en: What's up, Rhonda?
translation.zh: 怎么了 朗达？

translation.en: "...and dedicated to the proposition that all men..."
translation.zh: “…奉行人人生来平等的信条…”

translation.en: Have you seen this girl around here? JASON: Why do you ask?
translation.zh:
-你在这里见过这个女人吗？
-问这干嘛？

translation.en: She was reported missing.
translation.zh: 她失踪了

translation.en: "...and so dedicated, can long endure."
translation.zh: “…能够长久坚持下去”

translation.en: Yeah. I remember her.
translation.zh: 我记得她

translation.en: What did she want? Weed, pills?
translation.zh: 她想要什么？大麻 毒品？

translation.en: She wanted a gun.
translation.zh: 她想要枪

translation.en: I told her it's not my thing.
translation.zh: 我告诉她我不卖枪

translation.en: I felt bad, though. She seemed really desperate.
translation.zh:
我很难过
她看起来很绝望

translation.en: She said it needed to be small... so she could keep it close.
translation.zh:
她想要小点的枪
以便随身携带

translation.en: Are you sure this is her?
translation.zh: 你确定是她？

translation.en: You don't forget a girl like that in here.
translation.zh:
在这里遇到这样的女人
你是不会忘记的

translation.en: She was all in pink.
translation.zh: 她穿着一身粉色衣服

translation.en: It was Valentine's Day.
translation.zh: 那天是情人节

translation.en: AMY: For Valentine's Day, I thought I'd buy a gun.
translation.zh:
（2012年2月14日） 为了情人节
我要买一把枪

translation.en: That is how crazy I've become.
translation.zh: 我已经疯了

translation.en: Nick wants me gone but he won't ask for a divorce.
translation.zh:
尼克想让我离开
但他不愿提出离婚

translation.en: In his mind, I'm the owner of his bar, his only line of credit.
translation.zh:
在他看来 我是酒吧的所有者
酒吧是他的贷款担保

translation.en: The bitch with the prenup.
translation.zh: 我是和他订了婚前协议的婊子

translation.en: I could go home to my parents...
translation.zh: 我本可以回去找我的父母…

translation.en: but I'd have to tell them the truth.
translation.zh: 但我必须告诉他们真相

translation.en: And I don't even know if I believe the truth. (WATER RUNNING)
translation.zh:
连我都不知道
我是否相信这个真相

translation.en: Can I really think Nick would hurt me?
translation.zh:
我能否真的认为
尼克要伤害我？

translation.en: I'm being paranoid. Crazy.
translation.zh: 我得了妄想症 变得疯狂

translation.en: It's just...
translation.zh: 只是…

translation.en: I'd sleep better with a gun.
translation.zh: 有了枪我才能安然入睡

translation.en: (NICK SIGHS)
translation.zh:
（7月8日
事发三天后）

translation.en: NICK: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 哦 糟糕

好了

我遗憾地告诉你

艾米在那里流了很多血 尼克
很多

等等

我这么说是因为

translation.zh: 你也关注这个吗？

translation.en: We just found out...
translation.zh:
昨晚有了重大发现
我们最新发现

translation.en: Amy Elliott Dunne was, indeed, pregnant when she went missing.
translation.zh:
艾米埃利奥特邓恩
失踪时已有身孕

translation.en: Kelly Capitono, this makes me wanna throw up.
translation.zh:
艾米埃利奥特邓恩
失踪时已有身孕 凯莉凯普托诺
这让我感到恶心

translation.en: What is it about a pregnant woman...
translation.zh:
凯莉凯普托诺
这让我感到恶心 是什么让一个孕妇
一个体内承载着生命的女人

translation.en: a woman carrying life inside her...
translation.zh:
是什么让一个孕妇
一个体内承载着生命的女人

translation.en: that turns men into animals?
translation.zh:
是什么让一个孕妇
一个体内承载着生命的女人 遭受丈夫的兽行呢？

translation.en: KELLY: Ellen, this is an epidemic.
translation.zh: 埃伦 这种犯罪正在蔓延

translation.en: The third leading cause of death among pregnant women...
translation.zh: 孕妇死亡的第三大因素

translation.en: is homicide committed by a boyfriend or husband.
translation.zh: 就是男友或丈夫的谋杀

translation.en: Let's not forget about the wife, ever.
translation.zh: 让我们永远缅怀这位妻子

translation.en: Tonight, we welcome Amy's best friend, Noelle Hawthorne.
translation.zh:
今晚 我们邀请到艾米最好的朋友
诺埃尔霍桑

translation.en: Thanks for being on the show, Noelle.
translation.zh: 感谢你参加我们的节目 诺埃尔

translation.en: Thank you, Ellen.
translation.zh: 谢谢 埃伦

translation.en: And let me just say this...
translation.zh: 谢谢 埃伦 请允许我说

translation.en: Amy would have loved you, and all you do for women.
translation.zh:
艾米会爱你的
爱你为女性做的一切

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
translation.zh: 哦 谢谢

translation.en: Why don't you tell us about your friend, Noelle? (CHUCKLING)
translation.zh:
你和我们讲讲你的好朋友吧
诺埃尔？

translation.en: Amy was so nurturing.
translation.zh: 艾米非常有爱心

translation.en: Oh, I'd love if just once, someone was like...
translation.zh: 艾米非常有爱心 我真希望有人能说

translation.en: "She was a real rag."
translation.zh: 我真希望有人能说  “她真的是个怨妇”

translation.en: She was beautiful and smart and kind.
translation.zh: 她美丽 聪明 善良

translation.en: Seems like a rich bitch to me.
translation.zh: 我觉得就是个有钱的婊子

translation.en: What do you mean? People love her.
translation.zh: 为什么这么说？大家都喜欢她

translation.en: GRETA: I don't know. She seems uppity.
translation.zh: 我不知道 感觉她很傲慢

translation.en: Spoiled rich girl, married a cheating asshole.
translation.zh:
被宠坏的富家女
嫁给了一个满口谎言的混蛋

translation.en: Paid the ultimate price.
translation.zh: 罪有应得

translation.en: NOELLE: The only secret was her husband. We never met Nick.
translation.zh:
唯一的秘密是她的丈夫
我们从未见过尼克

translation.en: He never introduced himself.
translation.zh: 他从未介绍过自己

translation.en: ELLEN: Why was that, Noelle? Why do you think?
translation.zh:
为什么是这样 诺埃尔？
你觉得呢？

translation.en: I think we know why.
translation.zh:
为什么是这样 诺埃尔？
你觉得呢？ 我觉得我们知道为什么

translation.en: Because he had a violent temper.
translation.zh: 因为他有暴力倾向

translation.en: A little harsh. That's life, baby.
translation.zh:
-别这么说他
-这就是生活 亲爱的

translation.en: He knew I'd have seen right through him.
translation.zh: 他知道我会看穿他

translation.en: Don't get me wrong.
translation.zh: 别误会

translation.en: I'm not saying it's okay he killed her.
translation.zh: 别误会 我不是说他应该杀她

translation.en: I'm just saying, there are consequences.
translation.zh: 我只是觉得 一切皆有因果报应

translation.en: She was so alone.
translation.zh: 真爽 她好孤独

translation.en: And she was so innocent.
translation.zh: 她好孤独 好无辜

translation.en: You're a good friend, Noelle. And you're a good friend of the show.
translation.zh:
你是个很好的朋友 诺埃尔
你也是我们节目的好朋友

translation.en: Thanks for coming on. (PHONE RINGING)
translation.zh: 感谢你的参与

translation.en: Please tell me you landed Tanner Bolt.
translation.zh: 告诉我你拿下了塔纳博尔特

translation.en: Tanner Bolt landed me.
translation.zh: 告诉我你拿下了塔纳博尔特 塔纳博尔特拿下了我

translation.en: I'm gonna try and see Desi Collings on my way home.
translation.zh:
塔纳博尔特拿下了我 回去的路上
我要去见德西柯林斯

translation.en: And, Go...
translation.zh:
回去的路上
我要去见德西柯林斯 玛戈

translation.en: Tanner's retainer is $100,000.
translation.zh: 玛戈 塔纳要十万美元的预付金

translation.en: That's just the retainer.
translation.zh: 这只是预付金

translation.en: Listen, I've got $47,000 in savings. I've got $2,500 in an IRA.
translation.zh:
听着 我有4万7存款
个人退休账户还有2千5

translation.en: I'm approved for a second mortgage on the house. We will go from there.
translation.zh:
听着 我有4万7存款
个人退休账户还有2千5 我还通过了房子的第二抵押权审核
如果不够再说吧

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh:
我还通过了房子的第二抵押权审核
如果不够再说吧 谢谢

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I love you, too.
translation.zh:
-我爱你
-我也爱你

translation.en: Nick keeps his father, who has Alzheimer's, in a facility.
translation.zh:
尼克把他患有阿兹海默症的父亲
放在养老院里

translation.en: Number of times he visited last year? One.
translation.zh:
去年他去拜访过几次呢？
一次

translation.en: Oh, fuck!
translation.zh:
去年他去拜访过几次呢？
一次 哦 混蛋！

translation.en: His twin sister, Margo, well, she is a peach.
translation.zh:
他的双胞胎妹妹 玛戈
她很可爱

translation.en: These two spend their days in the bar Amy bought them.
translation.zh:
他们兄妹俩终日待在
艾米给他们买的酒吧里

translation.en: Playing what, Lauren? Playing house?
translation.zh:
他们兄妹俩终日待在
艾米给他们买的酒吧里 玩什么呢 劳伦？玩过家家？

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.zh: 玩什么呢 劳伦？玩过家家？

translation.en: Twin siblings often enable and abet.
translation.zh: 王八蛋 双胞胎兄妹非常容易互相怂恿

translation.en: While I never examined Nick, or his sister...
translation.zh: 双胞胎兄妹非常容易互相怂恿 我从未测试过尼克或他的妹妹

translation.en: they both seem very, very close.
translation.zh: 我从未测试过尼克或他的妹妹 他们看起来很亲密

translation.en: It's twin-cest.
translation.zh: 他们看起来很亲密 双胞胎兄妹乱伦

translation.en: Disturbingly close, Lauren.
translation.zh: 双胞胎兄妹乱伦 令人不安的亲密 劳伦

translation.en: And so, we close with a question.
translation.zh: 令人不安的亲密 劳伦 我们将带着疑问结束我们的节目

translation.en: What kind of moral rot...
translation.zh: 我们将带着疑问结束我们的节目

translation.en: allows a beautiful, talented, kind, smart, loving mother...
translation.zh:
怎样的道德沦丧 使得一位美丽、多才
善良、聪明、有爱的母亲

translation.en: to vanish without the heavens hearing our outraged cries?
translation.zh:
使得一位美丽、多才
善良、聪明、有爱的母亲 杳无踪影
而上天却听不到我们义愤的呐喊？

translation.en: Can I bum a cigarette? Yeah.
translation.zh:
杳无踪影
而上天却听不到我们义愤的呐喊？ 能让我抽支烟吗？

translation.en: Amy Elliott Dunne, we care about you, and we will not forget.
translation.zh:
艾米埃利奥特邓恩
我们关心你 我们不会忘记你

translation.en: And you know what else we won't forget?
translation.zh: 知道我们还不会忘记什么吗？

translation.en: Missouri has the death penalty.
translation.zh: 密苏里州有死刑

translation.en: Amen.
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: I'd like to report some strange activity...
translation.zh: 我想报告一些奇怪的活动

translation.en: near the woodshed on the property of one Margo Dunne.
translation.zh: 我想报告一些奇怪的活动 在玛戈邓恩家的柴房附近

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Mr. Collings.
translation.zh:
-邓恩先生
-柯林斯先生

translation.en: I know you. I saw you at the volunteer center.
translation.zh:
我认识你
我在志愿者中心见过你

translation.en: I wanted to help.
translation.zh:
我认识你
我在志愿者中心见过你 我是想帮忙

translation.en: Well, I hope you don't mind me coming by.
translation.zh: 希望你不介意我来找你

translation.en: I got your address from this letter that you wrote my wife.
translation.zh:
希望你不介意我来找你 我是从你写给我妻子的信上
找到这个地址的

translation.en: Amy and I believe in the lost art of letter-writing.
translation.zh:
艾米和我仍然尊崇
逝去的书信形式

translation.en: I always wondered why you kept in touch after...
translation.zh:
我一直好奇为什么你还要和她联系
毕竟经历了…

translation.en: You were together for two years in boarding school, right?
translation.zh: 那些事 你们在寄宿学校同窗了两年 对吗？

translation.en: She was my first serious girlfriend.
translation.zh: 你们在寄宿学校同窗了两年 对吗？ 她是我第一个正式的女友

translation.en: Why did you break up?
translation.zh: 她是我第一个正式的女友

translation.en: That's a strange question.
translation.zh:
-你们为什么分手呢？
-这个问题很奇怪

translation.en: Did you treat her bad? Did you cheat on her?
translation.zh:
-你们为什么分手呢？
-这个问题很奇怪 你对她不好吗？
你对她不忠？

translation.en: That's a rude question.
translation.zh:
你对她不好吗？
你对她不忠？

translation.en: Let me tell you what Amy told me.
translation.zh:
这个问题很无礼 我告诉你
艾米是怎么跟我说的

translation.en: She dumped you, you completely unraveled.
translation.zh:
我告诉你
艾米是怎么跟我说的 她甩了你
于是你精神错乱

translation.en: You stalked her, you threatened her...
translation.zh:
她甩了你
于是你精神错乱 你跟踪她 威胁她

translation.en: and you attempted suicide in her bed and were institutionalized.
translation.zh:
还试图在她的床上自杀
结果被送到精神病院

translation.en: Your wife is missing, and you came all this way to tell me this?
translation.zh:
你妻子失踪了
你却大老远跑来告诉我这些？

translation.en: I thought there might be another side to this story.
translation.zh: 我觉得这个故事另有隐情

translation.en: Mr. Collings.
translation.zh: 柯林斯先生

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: MAN: (ON RADIO) ...the missing persons case of Amy Elliott Dunne.
translation.zh: …艾米埃利奥特邓恩的失踪案

translation.en: She is the beautiful blonde inspiration... for the Amazing Amy kids' book series.
translation.zh:
她是《神奇艾米》儿童丛书
的原型人物

translation.en: You're reading that diary again?
translation.zh: 你又在读那本日记？

translation.en: You know how it ends.
translation.zh: 你已经知道结尾了

translation.en: It interests me.
translation.zh: 它很吸引我

translation.en: Hey, Rhonda.
translation.zh: 嘿 朗达

translation.en: "He's gonna kill me." The end.
translation.zh: “他要杀了我” 就是结尾

translation.en: Why did he go to his dad's house to burn it?
translation.zh:
为什么他要去
他父亲的房子烧掉它？

translation.en: It's private. There's no one there.
translation.zh: 那是私人住宅 没有人能看到

translation.en: Why didn't he make sure it actually burned?
translation.zh:
那他为什么不确保
它被烧毁了呢？

translation.en: Because he tripped the alarm. You were up his ass with a flashlight.
translation.zh:
因为他触动了警铃
而你立即就出现了

translation.en: (GROANS) The whole thing just feels hinky.
translation.zh: 整件事情非常蹊跷

translation.en: Like finding an envelope marked "Clue."
translation.zh: 比如发现一个标着 “线索”的信封

translation.en: You ever hear the expression... "The simplest answer is often the correct one"?
translation.zh:
你是否听过“最简单的答案
通常就是正确答案”？

translation.en: Actually, I've never found that to be true.
translation.zh: 其实 我从未觉得那句话是对的

translation.en: Good night. Good night.
translation.zh:
-晚安
-晚安

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: (DOORBELL RINGING)
translation.zh:
（7月10日
事发五天后）

translation.en: Elvis is in Missouri.
translation.zh: 猫王来到了密苏里

translation.en: Thank God. Come on in.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地 进来吧

translation.en: NICK: First thing you have to understand about Amy... she loves to teach lessons.
translation.zh:
首先你要明白
艾米喜欢教训人

translation.en: Play God.
translation.zh:
首先你要明白
艾米喜欢教训人 -扮演上帝
-是的 旧约中的上帝

translation.en: Yeah, Old Testament God.
translation.zh:
-扮演上帝
-是的 旧约中的上帝

translation.en: Okay. Keep talking. She finds out I've been cheating on her with Andie...
translation.zh:
-继续说
-她发现我和安迪的私情

translation.en: decides to teach me a lesson.
translation.zh: 于是决定教训我

translation.en: Fakes her own death, frames me for it.
translation.zh: 伪造她的死亡 让我钻入圈套

translation.en: Blood in the house, credit cards, life insurance.
translation.zh: 房中的血迹 信用卡 人寿保险

translation.en: She does the treasure hunt.
translation.zh: 她玩寻宝游戏

translation.en: NICK: Now, the treasure hunt is critical.
translation.zh: 现在 寻宝游戏非常关键

translation.en: She's taking us on a tour of my infidelities. Rubbing my nose in it.
translation.zh:
她要带着我们去见证我的不忠
提醒我犯的错误

translation.en: And she leaves clue number one for the police...
translation.zh: 她把线索一留给警察

translation.en: which will lead them back to my office...
translation.zh: 好把他们引到我的办公室

translation.en: which is a place where Andie and I would often...
translation.zh: 安迪和我经常在那里…

translation.en: And she leaves a pair of red panties.
translation.zh: 她还留下了一条红色内裤

translation.en: Right. Racy, looks bad.
translation.zh: 不雅 看起来很糟

translation.en: Clue two. My father's house.
translation.zh:
-线索二
-我父亲的房子

translation.en: Another place where Andie and I... would occasionally have relations.
translation.zh: 那是安迪和我偶尔私会的另一个地方

translation.en: Clue three? Woodshed.
translation.zh:
-线索三？
-柴房

translation.en: Also a location... Oh, my God.
translation.zh:
-也是我们…
-哦 天呐

translation.en: We had limited options. A hotel.
translation.zh:
-我们没地方去
-去开房啊

translation.en: Amy would have seen the credit card bill. Put it on Andie's credit card.
translation.zh:
-艾米会看到信用卡记录的
-那就用安迪的信用卡

translation.en: Andie's statement went right to her parents.
translation.zh:
安迪的结算单
会寄给她的父母

translation.en: Ew. Nick, Margo, can we head over to the little brown house?
translation.zh:
尼克 玛戈
我们还是说说棕色小屋吧？

translation.en: This leads us to what? My dad's house.
translation.zh:
-这会把我们引到何处？
-我父亲的房子

translation.en: Dad's house is blue.
translation.zh: 父亲的房子是蓝色的

translation.en: After the divorce, when Dad wasn't coming around...
translation.zh:
父母离婚后
父亲不常去住

translation.en: I used to pretend that he was a spy named Mr. Brown, who...
translation.zh:
我曾经假想他是一个间谍
名叫棕色布朗

translation.en: for the sake of his children's safety, had to deny their existence.
translation.zh:
为了他孩子的安全
不得已很少露面

translation.en: You never told me that.
translation.zh: 你从没跟我说过

translation.en: You told her that?
translation.zh: 你告诉艾米这些了？

translation.en: We've got incriminating red panties in your office.
translation.zh: 在你的办公室发现了红内裤

translation.en: We've got a Showcase Showdown worth of crap in your woodshed.
translation.zh:
在你的柴房里
发现了一大堆昂贵的东西

translation.en: So, what in God's name is at your father's house, Nick?
translation.zh:
在你父亲的房子里到底有什么
尼克？

translation.en: And be honest. I honestly have no idea.
translation.zh: 老实说 我不知道

translation.en: TANNER: Well... Whatever they found, I think it's safe to assume that it's very bad.
translation.zh:
不论警察找到了什么
我们最好从坏处着想

translation.en: TANNER: We got a lot of uncontained issues here.
translation.zh: 有很多事情难以控制

translation.en: Nick, do you have any idea as to what Andie's mindset is?
translation.zh: 尼克 你知道安迪情绪如何吗？

translation.en: Well, we haven't communicated since the vigil.
translation.zh: 守夜过后我们就再没联系过

translation.en: Okay. Amy's parents?
translation.zh: 好的 艾米的父母呢？

translation.en: No, it's... More pressure.
translation.zh:
-没有 只是…
-压力更大

translation.en: We got a hurt, young girlfriend...
translation.zh:
-没有 只是…
-压力更大 这个痛苦的年轻女友
随时都会公开露面

translation.en: who will no doubt go public at any moment.
translation.zh:
这个痛苦的年轻女友
随时都会公开露面

translation.en: No, Andie won't do that. She will.
translation.zh:
这个痛苦的年轻女友
随时都会公开露面 -不 安迪不会这么做
-她会的

translation.en: They always do. Don't take it personally.
translation.zh:
她们总是会这么做
别介意我这么说

translation.en: Amy's got us in an interesting bind.
translation.zh: 艾米让我们身陷困境

translation.en: We need to tell the cops about Andie. Really?
translation.zh:
-我们需要向警察供出安迪
-真的？

translation.en: Right now, Andie just gives you another motive.
translation.zh: 现在 安迪成为你的另一个杀人动机

translation.en: We need to tell the cops about the woodshed.
translation.zh: 我们要告诉警察柴房的事情

translation.en: We need to be on the front end of that.
translation.zh: 需要领先警察一步坦白

translation.en: But I'm gonna warn you as to what will happen.
translation.zh:
需要领先警察一步坦白 但我要警告你
可能产生的结果

translation.en: They'll go after Margo.
translation.zh: 他们会调查玛戈

translation.en: They can't do that, can they?
translation.zh: 他们不能这么做 对吗？

translation.en: She's your accomplice. She helped you hide the evidence.
translation.zh:
她是你的共犯
她帮助你藏匿证据

translation.en: In all likelihood, she knows that you killed Amy.
translation.zh: 十有八九 她知道你杀了艾米

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 天呐

translation.en: Well, what are we going to do?
translation.zh: 那我们该怎么做？

translation.en: We find Amy. (MARGO SIGHS)
translation.zh: 那我们该怎么做？ 找到艾米

translation.en: No. Any other strategy is missing the point.
translation.zh: 其他策略都抓不住要害

translation.en: I've got two ex-Secret Service guys that are really good.
translation.zh: 我有两个前特工 非常在行

translation.en: I'll put them on it.
translation.zh: 我会让他们跟进

translation.en: But where do they start, Nick?
translation.zh: 但该从哪里找呢 尼克？

translation.en: Where would Amy go?
translation.zh: 艾米会去哪里呢？

translation.en: I have no idea.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Are we keeping score?
translation.zh: 要记分吗？

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: I thought we were steering clear of men for a while.
translation.zh: 我以为我们暂时都不找男人呢

translation.en: He's nice.
translation.zh: 他人不错

translation.en: Because he wants to fuck you.
translation.zh: 因为他想干你

translation.en: And just think how her mother must feel at a time like this.
translation.zh: 想想看她母亲现在是何感受

translation.en: Wine cellar's downstairs.
translation.zh: 酒窖在楼下

translation.en: I'll get you some clothes, too.
translation.zh: 我还会给你带些衣服过来

translation.en: Not that I don't appreciate Bait Shop Chic.
translation.zh:
不是说我不喜欢
你现在穿的衣服

translation.en: The floors are heated, just dial to your liking.
translation.zh:
地板带有地暖
只需要调到你喜欢的温度

translation.en: There's robes and towels. The shower has steam.
translation.zh:
有浴袍和浴巾
浴室有蒸汽 浴盆有按摩系统

translation.en: The bathtub has a massage cycle.
translation.zh: 浴盆有按摩系统

translation.en: There's a great view, if you're in the mood.
translation.zh:
如果你心情好
可以看看窗外的美景

translation.en: Blackout curtains if you're not.
translation.zh: 心情不好 就把窗帘拉上

translation.en: The bed is Savoir.
translation.zh: 床是奢华品牌

translation.en: You'll never get a better sleep.
translation.zh: 会让你得到最好的睡眠

translation.en: Oh, this is just what I need.
translation.zh: 我正需要这个

translation.en: I'm so exhausted.
translation.zh: 真是太累了

translation.en: I'll leave you to it, then.
translation.zh: 那我不打扰你了

translation.en: Amy, I am so happy that you are here.
translation.zh: 艾米 我很高兴你来这里

translation.en: And I don't want you to worry for one moment.
translation.zh: 我希望你一刻也不要担心

translation.en: There are cameras everywhere.
translation.zh: 到处都有摄像头

translation.en: The exterior, all along the grounds, the entryway.
translation.zh: 屋外 院子里 入口通道

translation.en: Anyone...
translation.zh: 所有人

translation.en: who is caught coming or going...
translation.zh: 进进出出

translation.en: will be recorded.
translation.zh: 都会被录下

translation.en: You are more than safe.
translation.zh: 你在这里非常安全

translation.en: And I am not letting you get away again.
translation.zh: 我再也不会让你离开了

translation.en: (DOOR OPENS) Good morning! (GASPING) Don't do that!
translation.zh:
-早上好！
-不要这么做！

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: I need to feel safe.
translation.zh: 我需要安全感

translation.en: You are very safe.
translation.zh: 你很安全

translation.en: What have you been up to? Nothing.
translation.zh:
-你在忙什么？
-没什么 艾米 我不是尼克

translation.en: Amy, I'm not Nick.
translation.zh: 艾米 我不是尼克

translation.en: It's hard for me.
translation.zh: 我一时很难适应

translation.en: After so many years under someone's thumb...
translation.zh: 被控制这么多年

translation.en: I know just what that feels like.
translation.zh: 我曾深有同感

translation.en: You were never under my thumb.
translation.zh: 我从没控制过你

translation.en: On your leash. Never.
translation.zh:
-像控制狗一样
-从来没有

translation.en: A new start.
translation.zh: 新的开始

translation.en: Decent clothes.
translation.zh: 漂亮的衣服

translation.en: Hair dye. Makeup. Tweezers.
translation.zh: 染发剂 化妆品 镊子

translation.en: There's a gym overlooking the lake.
translation.zh:
屋里还有健身房
可以远眺湖泊

translation.en: The sooner you look like yourself... the sooner you'll feel like yourself.
translation.zh:
你越早看起来像自己
就越快能找回自己的感觉

translation.en: I'll get groceries for tonight... we'll watch Sharon Schieber, and finally move on.
translation.zh:
我出去买今晚的菜
然后一起看莎朗希伯的节目

translation.en: I think that's something I should watch on my own.
translation.zh: 我想自己看

translation.en: Nonsense.
translation.zh: 胡说

translation.en: I'll be back.
translation.zh: 我会回来的

translation.en: And I am looking forward...
translation.zh: 我还期待着

translation.en: to my reunion with Amy Elliott.
translation.zh: 与艾米埃利奥特重聚

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 真是时候

translation.en: Good evening, I'm Sharon Schieber.
translation.zh: 晚上好 我是莎朗希伯

translation.en: Tonight, exclusively... Hurry up.
translation.zh:
晚上好 我是莎朗希伯 -今晚的独家专访…
-快来

translation.en: A husband breaks his silence... not just on his wife's disappearance...
translation.zh:
一个丈夫打破沉默
不仅谈及他妻子的失踪

translation.en: but on his infidelity, and all those shocking rumors.
translation.zh:
还将谈及他的不忠
以及所有那些惊人的流言蜚语

translation.en: Nick Dunne...
translation.zh: 尼克邓恩

translation.en: you're probably the most hated man in America right now.
translation.zh:
你现在可能是美国
最让人憎恨的男人

translation.en: I probably am. And I probably deserve it.
translation.zh:
可能是
可能也是我应受的

translation.en: I bought that tie.
translation.zh: 那是我买的领带

translation.en: Did you kill your wife, Nick?
translation.zh: 你是否杀了你妻子 尼克？

translation.en: I did not kill my wife.
translation.zh: 我没有杀我妻子

translation.en: I am not a murderer.
translation.zh: 我不是凶手

translation.en: SHARON: But you were unfaithful.
translation.zh: 但是你对她不忠

translation.en: I was unfaithful.
translation.zh: 我的确对她不忠

translation.en: And I am deeply ashamed.
translation.zh: 我深感羞愧

translation.en: SHARON: And, on top of that, you allowed Amy's parents...
translation.zh:
除此之外
你还让艾米的父母

translation.en: her friends, all the people in your hometown...
translation.zh:
她的朋友
以及你家乡所有的人

translation.en: believe you were a loving husband, desperate to find his missing wife.
translation.zh:
都相信你是个可爱的丈夫
急切希望找到失踪的妻子

translation.en: Well, I am desperate to find my missing wife.
translation.zh:
我确实急切希望
找到失踪的妻子

translation.en: You say that, but I'm wondering... how you expect us to believe you...
translation.zh:
话虽如此 可你觉得
我们该如何相信你

translation.en: now that we know you're a liar.
translation.zh: 因为我们知道你满嘴谎话

translation.en: I didn't come forward with my affair...
translation.zh: 我之前没有坦白我的私情

translation.en: because I knew it would make me look really, really bad.
translation.zh: 因为我知道这会让我形象扫地

translation.en: But I don't care about that anymore.
translation.zh: 但我现在不在乎这些了

translation.en: I just want to find my wife.
translation.zh: 我只想找到我的妻子

translation.en: SHARON: I'm just trying to get clear-- NICK: Let me be clear.
translation.zh:
-我想弄清楚…
-让我说得更清楚一点

translation.en: Just because I am not a murderer doesn't make me a good guy.
translation.zh:
虽然我不是凶手
但也不意味着我就是个好人

translation.en: I'm not a good guy.
translation.zh: 我不是好人

translation.en: I was a bad husband to a great wife.
translation.zh:
我是个卑鄙的丈夫
却娶了一个伟大的妻子

translation.en: I broke the vow that I made to her.
translation.zh: 我违背了给她的誓言

translation.en: Those are pretty words, Nick.
translation.zh: 这些话听起来动人 尼克

translation.en: But what does that really mean to you?
translation.zh: 但对你究竟有何意义？

translation.en: It basically means that I was a con artist.
translation.zh: 这意味着我曾是欺骗高手

translation.en: I met Amy Elliott seven years ago.
translation.zh: 七年前我遇见艾米埃利奥特

translation.en: I was completely transfixed.
translation.zh: 我完全被征服了

translation.en: Amy can do that to you.
translation.zh: 艾米就有这种魅力

translation.en: I was this average guy from an average place...
translation.zh:
我当时只不过是
小地方来的普通男人

translation.en: with mediocre aspirations.
translation.zh: 胸怀普通的愿望

translation.en: And I met a woman who dazzled me.
translation.zh: 但我遇到了让我目眩的女人

translation.en: And I wanted her to love me...
translation.zh: 我希望她爱我

translation.en: so I pretended to be better than I was.
translation.zh: 于是我装出一个更好的自己

translation.en: When we got married, I promised to be that guy.
translation.zh:
我们结婚后
我向她承诺

translation.en: That guy who works harder.
translation.zh: 我会工作更努力

translation.en: That guy who, who lives and acts...
translation.zh: 用和她一样的热情

translation.en: and loves with as much passion as she does.
translation.zh: 去生活 去表现 去爱

translation.en: But I failed her. (LIQUID POURING)
translation.zh: 但我让她失望了

translation.en: Instead of doing what was right...
translation.zh: 我没有做正确的事

translation.en: I did what was easy.
translation.zh: 而做了容易的事

translation.en: You talk like a man who believes he can make amends to his wife.
translation.zh:
你这话听起来好像
自己能够弥补对妻子犯下的错

translation.en: Who believes his wife is still alive.
translation.zh: 你相信妻子仍然活着

translation.en: She is still alive.
translation.zh: 她的确仍然活着

translation.en: Will you look at that camera for me?
translation.zh: 你能看着摄像机吗？

translation.en: Will you look in the lens...
translation.zh: 你能看着镜头

translation.en: and talk to your wife?
translation.zh: 你能看着镜头 和你的妻子说两句吗？

translation.en: If she is out there, able to hear and see you tonight...
translation.zh:
如果她今晚真的在电视机前
能够听到和看到你

translation.en: what would you like to say to her, Nick?
translation.zh: 你会对她说什么 尼克？

translation.en: Amy, I love you.
translation.zh: 艾米 我爱你

translation.en: You're the best person I've ever known.
translation.zh: 你是我见过的最优秀的人

translation.en: And I've taken myself to the woodshed... for the way that I've treated you.
translation.zh:
我已经因为对你不好
而受到惩罚

translation.en: And if you come back, I promise...
translation.zh: 如果你能回来 我保证

translation.en: I will spend every day making it up to you.
translation.zh: 我会利用每一天来弥补你

translation.en: I will be the man that I promised you I would be.
translation.zh: 我会成为向你承诺的那样

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: Come home.
translation.zh: 回家吧

translation.en: SHARON: Regardless of what you thought...
translation.zh: 不论你怎么想

translation.en: NICK: What does it say?
translation.zh: 不论你怎么想 网站上怎么说？

translation.en: ...I think we can all agree...
translation.zh: …我想我们都能认同…

translation.en: Oh, my God. You fucking killed it.
translation.zh: 哦 天呐 你成功了

translation.en: ...there's more to him than meets the eye.
translation.zh:
…外表之下
他有更丰富的内心

translation.en: They're going crazy for you.
translation.zh: 他们都为你疯狂

translation.en: They disliked me, they liked me, they hated me.
translation.zh:
他们不喜欢我 又喜欢我
又憎恨我

translation.en: And now they love me. (SIRENS WAILING)
translation.zh: 现在又爱我

translation.en: ...a candor and an honesty that's worthy of respect.
translation.zh: …他的坦率和真诚值得尊敬

translation.en: He's certainly earned mine.
translation.zh: 他显然赢得了我的尊敬

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 什么情况？

translation.en: I'm Sharon Schieber. Good night.
translation.zh: 我是莎朗希伯 晚安

translation.en: Margo Dunne, this is a search warrant for your property.
translation.zh: 玛戈邓恩 这是搜查令

translation.en: I usually ignore tipline calls...
translation.zh: 玛戈邓恩 这是搜查令 我通常不在意举报电话

translation.en: but a neighbor was concerned about... a strange man around your woodshed.
translation.zh:
但一位邻居很担心
你家柴房附近的一个陌生男人

translation.en: Call Tanner.
translation.zh: 打给塔纳

translation.en: Okay. Fuck!
translation.zh: 好的 该死！

translation.en: Girlfriend's real cute, Nick.
translation.zh: 你的女友很可爱 尼克

translation.en: Is that what this is about?
translation.zh: 你们来就因为这个？

translation.en: I have treated you more than fair... throughout this entire investigation.
translation.zh:
整个调查过程中
我一直待你不薄

translation.en: I gave you the benefit of the doubt over and over.
translation.zh: 我屡次让你躲过嫌疑

translation.en: Every time you said something stupid...
translation.zh: 每次你说出一些愚蠢的话

translation.en: I thought, "Maybe he's just stupid."
translation.zh: 我都觉得： “也许他真的很愚蠢”

translation.en: But I was wrong. That's what this is about.
translation.zh:
但我错了
我来是为了这个

translation.en: None of that is mine.
translation.zh:
你不打高尔夫
哪里来的球杆？ 那都不是我的
都不是我放进去的

translation.en: None of this was put here by me.
translation.zh:
那都不是我的
都不是我放进去的

translation.en: Those are nice clubs. You got the makings of a real man cave.
translation.zh:
那些都是名贵球杆
你这个藏宝地点设计得真巧妙

translation.en: Everything just waiting until the wife goes away for good.
translation.zh: 一切都静待妻子永远离去

translation.en: GO: Nick!
translation.zh: 尼克！

translation.en: Of course we can.
translation.zh:
-你们不能抓她！
-当然可以

translation.en: Amy, it's time to move on.
translation.zh: 艾米 你应该向前看

translation.en: What can I do to help?
translation.zh: 我怎么能帮到你？

translation.en: I need some time to think.
translation.zh: 我需要时间思考

translation.en: That's the last thing you need.
translation.zh:
我需要时间思考 -你不用思考
-德西…

translation.en: Desi--
translation.zh:
-你不用思考
-德西…

translation.en: Twenty years, you have kept me dangling.
translation.zh:
二十年了
你一直让我魂牵梦萦

translation.en: Finally, last night, you came to me, and you chose me.
translation.zh:
终于 昨晚 你找到我
你选择了我

translation.en: Follow that instinct.
translation.zh: 追随这份直觉

translation.en: Don't trust the instinct that left you beaten and homeless...
translation.zh:
而不要相信以前那份直觉
它让你挨打 无家可归

translation.en: sleeping in your car, fearing for your life.
translation.zh:
而不要相信以前那份直觉
它让你挨打 无家可归 睡在车里 对人生充满恐惧

translation.en: I'm not gonna force myself on you.
translation.zh: 我不会强求一亲芳泽

translation.en: I understand what you're saying, Desi.
translation.zh: 我懂你的意思 德西

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我懂

translation.en: I've been so mistreated for so long.
translation.zh: 我被虐待这么久

translation.en: I've forgotten how to behave.
translation.zh: 已经忘记了该如何谈恋爱

translation.en: I'll move in here tomorrow...
translation.zh: 我明天搬过来

translation.en: and we'll work it out together.
translation.zh: 我们一起共度难关

translation.en: I just want you to be you again.
translation.zh: 我只想让你做回自己

translation.en: TANNER: They only took Margo to fuck with you.
translation.zh:
他们抓捕玛戈
只是为了激怒你

translation.en: She's not spending another fucking second in there.
translation.zh: 不能让她在这里多待一秒钟

translation.en: I'm gonna go in, and I'm gonna tell them everything.
translation.zh:
我要进去
向他们和盘托出

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: We tell Boney very little.
translation.zh: 我们不能向博尼说实情

translation.en: Without a body, without a murder weapon...
translation.zh:
没有尸体
没有杀人武器

translation.en: their only hope is a confession.
translation.zh:
没有尸体
没有杀人武器 他们只能寄希望于你自首

translation.en: So, you let them do all the talking.
translation.zh: 他们只能寄希望于你自首 随便他们怎么说

translation.en: That way, we can jump-start your defense.
translation.zh: 我们要全力准备我们的辩词

translation.en: The truth is my defense.
translation.zh: 真相就是我的辩词

translation.en: Recognize these?
translation.zh: 认得这些吗？

translation.en: Yes. It's Amy's anniversary present to me.
translation.zh:
认得
是艾米给我买的结婚周年礼物

translation.en: Was that how she told you she was pregnant, Nick?
translation.zh:
她是否通过这种方式
告诉你她怀孕了 尼克？

translation.en: Mommy, Daddy, baby, and that made you real mad?
translation.zh:
妈妈 爸爸 孩子
这让你发疯了吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Recognize this? Never seen that before in my life.
translation.zh:
-认得这个吗？
-从来没见过

translation.en: It's Amy's diary. We found this at your father's house.
translation.zh:
这是艾米的日记
我们在你父亲的房子里找到的

translation.en: Is this your wife's handwriting?
translation.zh: 这是你妻子的笔迹吗？

translation.en: He's not a handwriting ex-- Looks like it.
translation.zh:
-他又不是笔迹专家…
-看起来像是

translation.en: Our experts thought so, too.
translation.zh: 我们的专家也这么认为

translation.en: Do you wanna play a little true or false?
translation.zh: 想玩真心话游戏吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: "And then he brushes the sugar off my lips so he can taste me."
translation.zh:
“他将糖粉从我的唇上抹掉
以便亲吻我”

translation.en: Yeah, that's true.
translation.zh: 那是真的

translation.en: You thought quinoa was a fish?
translation.zh: 你以为 “奎亚奴藜”是一种鱼？

translation.en: That is also true, yes.
translation.zh: 那也是真的

translation.en: She wanted to get pregnant, you assaulted her.
translation.zh: 她想怀孕 你却打了她

translation.en: I hit her? No, never happened.
translation.zh: 她想怀孕 你却打了她 我打她？不 从未有过

translation.en: "Pushed," it says "pushed." Absolutely not.
translation.zh:
- “推” 上面写的是 “推”
-绝对没有

translation.en: I never touched her.
translation.zh: 我从未伤害过她

translation.en: She tried to buy a gun.
translation.zh: 她想要买枪

translation.en: I doubt that, but I don't know.
translation.zh: 我怀疑 但我不知道

translation.en: Shall I read the last entry?
translation.zh: 要我读最后一篇吗？

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: "This man may kill me."
translation.zh: “这个男人可能要杀我”

translation.en: In her own words, "This man may kill me."
translation.zh:
她自己写的
 “这个男人可能要杀我”

translation.en: It's kind of a convenient end note.
translation.zh: 这只是一种轻率的遗言

translation.en: TANNER: For future reference...
translation.zh: 以后你记着

translation.en: the truth, you are not a handwriting expert.
translation.zh:
真相就是
你不是笔迹鉴定专家

translation.en: Okay, I know.
translation.zh:
真相就是
你不是笔迹鉴定专家 好的 我知道

translation.en: BONEY: Judy's missing handle.
translation.zh: 朱迪缺失的手柄

translation.en: Big as a two-by-four, right? Big as a club.
translation.zh:
五乘十厘米口径 对吗？
像球杆一样大

translation.en: We found this day one, in the fireplace in your home office.
translation.zh:
这是事发当天
在你家庭办公室的壁炉里发现的

translation.en: We didn't know what the hell it was, but fire in July?
translation.zh:
我们最初不知道这是什么
总不可能在七月里生火吧？

translation.en: We bagged it.
translation.zh: 我们收集起来

translation.en: I've never seen that before either.
translation.zh:
这个我也没见过 我们检测过
上面有艾米的血迹 尼克

translation.en: BONEY: We just tested it. Fire doesn't erase blood, Nick.
translation.zh:
我们检测过
上面有艾米的血迹 尼克

translation.en: So, finally, Nicholas Dunne...
translation.zh: 所以 尼古拉斯邓恩

translation.en: you're under arrest for the murder of your wife.
translation.zh:
因为你涉嫌谋杀妻子
我们现在拘捕你

translation.en: Do not say another word.
translation.zh: 什么都别说

translation.en: What about my side? Nick!
translation.zh:
-不让我陈述吗？
-尼克！

translation.en: More coffee?
translation.zh: 还要咖啡吗？ 好的

translation.en: I'd love it.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Remember that time we skipped school and drove to the Cape?
translation.zh:
还记得有一次我们翘课
开车去科德角吗？

translation.en: Oh, God, yeah. Lobster right from the ocean.
translation.zh: 记得 我们吃到了从海里抓的鲜龙虾

translation.en: This reminds me of that. (CHUCKLES)
translation.zh: 这段时间让我想起了从前

translation.en: Never-ending holiday.
translation.zh: 无穷无尽的假期

translation.en: You're not bored?
translation.zh: 你不厌倦吗？

translation.en: Desi, how could I be bored?
translation.zh: 德西 我怎么能厌倦呢？

translation.en: You can discuss 18th-century symphonies...
translation.zh: 你能讨论18世纪的交响乐

translation.en: 19th-century Impressionists, quote Proust in French.
translation.zh:
